scripts.deploy: npx cdk deploy --all --context stage=$ENVIRONMENT $([ "$ENVIRONMENT" = "prod" ] && echo '' || echo '--require-approval never')
scripts.destroy: if [ "$ENVIRONMENT" = "prod" ]; then echo 'Production destroy not allowed' && exit 1; else cdk destroy --all --force; fi
scripts.seed: if [ "$ENVIRONMENT" = "prod" ]; then echo 'Seeding not allowed in production' && exit 1; else node seed/seed.mjs; fi
scripts.seed:force: if [ "$ENVIRONMENT" = "prod" ]; then echo 'Seeding not allowed in production' && exit 1; else node seed/seed.mjs --force; fi
scripts.seed:job-matching: if [ "$ENVIRONMENT" = "prod" ]; then echo 'Seeding not allowed in production' && exit 1; else node seed/job-matching-seed.mjs; fi
